name: TELECHROME
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Jump, teleport and pick keys up in order to escape from... somewhere, I guess, in this monochromatic style game.

Created for Trijam #35 in 4 hours 10 minutes. 

Current content: 6 levels :P

I would love to continue with this proyect!

Controls: 

  • In the menus:
    • W-S to navigate through the menu,
    • Spacebar to select.

  • In the game:
    • A-D to move. 
    • Spacebar to jump.
    • Use the mouse to select where to teleport (Left Button).
